mapper.sql: id as id , name as name , abbr_code as abbrCode , region as region , address as address , status as status , type as type , parent as parent , create_dt as createDt , update_dt as updateDt , create_by as createBy , update_by as updateBy
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agencies ( name, abbr_code, region, address, status, type, parent, create_dt, update_dt, create_by, update_by ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{abbrCode}, #{region}, #{address}, #{status}, #{type}, #{parent}, #{createDt}, #{updateDt}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy} )

INSERT INTO agencies ( name, abbr_code, region, address, status, type, parent, create_dt, update_dt, create_by, update_by ) VALUES ( #{map.name}, #{map.abbrCode}, #{map.region}, #{map.address}, #{map.status}, #{map.type}, #{map.parent}, #{map.createDt}, #{map.updateDt}, #{map.createBy}, #{map.updateBy} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE agencies
name = #{name},
abbr_code = #{abbrCode},
region = #{region},
address = #{address},
status = #{status},
type = #{type},
parent = #{parent},
create_dt = #{createDt},
update_dt = #{updateDt},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE agencies
name = #{map.name},
abbr_code = #{map.abbrCode},
region = #{map.region},
address = #{map.address},
status = #{map.status},
type = #{map.type},
parent = #{map.parent},
create_dt = #{map.createDt},
update_dt = #{map.updateDt},
create_by = #{map.createBy},
update_by = #{map.updateBy},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE agencies
name = #{update.name},
abbr_code = #{update.abbrCode},
region = #{update.region},
address = #{update.address},
status = #{update.status},
type = #{update.type},
parent = #{update.parent},
create_dt = #{update.createDt},
update_dt = #{update.updateDt},
create_by = #{update.createBy},
update_by = #{update.updateBy},
${nativeSql}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, name
, abbr_code
, region
, address
, status
, type
, parent
, create_dt
, update_dt
, create_by
, update_by
FROM agencies
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
, id

, create_dt

FROM agencies

limit ${offset}, ${rows}
